title: 76. Autoimmune Conditions + the Esthetician (with Michele Phelan.)
description:
Welcome back to The Treatment Room podcast! In this week's episode I wanted to cover the important topic of autoimmune conditions, and their implications for skin, treatments, and what estheticians should be aware of working on these types of compromised immune systems. Thank you to my incredible guest, educator + esthetician, Michele Phelan of Concepts Institute. 

Get in touch with Michele.

To shop Glymed Plus, register on the top right via my authorized store:

https://glymedplus.com/home/index
